alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Okaloosa, central Santa Rosa and south central Escambia Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Eglin Air Force Base to 5 miles east of Roeville to Lillian. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Crestview, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Goulding, Bagdad, Myrtle Grove, Baker, Point Baker, Pea Ridge, Roeville and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
